name: Use_Tooling_API
description: Query, create, update, or delete records using the Tooling API. Supports SOQL queries and CRUD operations on Tooling API objects like ApexClass, CustomField, etc.

action.description: The Tooling API action to perform

objectType.description: The Tooling API object type (e.g., ApexClass, CustomField, CustomObject). Required for create, update, and delete actions

soql.description: The SOQL query to execute. Required for query action. Example: SELECT Id, Name FROM ApexClass

recordJson.description: JSON representation of the record to create or update. Required for create and update actions

recordId.description: Id of the record to update or delete. Required for update and delete actions
